text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Saitanacya pa'ulakhunanvara calu naka, jo manusya saitanacya pa'ulakhunanvara calela, tara to nirlajjata ani va'ita kamancaca adesa de'ila ani jara allahaci daya- krpa tumacyavara nasati tara tumacyapaiki konihi, kadhihi svaccha- sud'dha jhala nasata. Parantu allaha jyala paka (svaccha-sud'dha) karu icchito, karato. Ani allaha sarva kahi aikanara ani sarva kahi jananara ahe
